ğŸ“¥ HÆ¯á»šNG DáºªN CÃ€I Äáº¶T
--------------------

BÆ¯á»šC 1: CÃ i Ä‘áº·t MySQL Server
-----------------------------
1. Táº£i MySQL Community Server tá»«:
   https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/

2. CÃ i Ä‘áº·t MySQL vá»›i thiáº¿t láº­p máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh:
   - Port: 3306
   - Root password: Äáº·t password máº¡nh (ghi nhá»› láº¡i!)
   
3. Khá»Ÿi Ä‘á»™ng MySQL Server:
   - Windows: Tá»± Ä‘á»™ng khá»Ÿi Ä‘á»™ng sau khi cÃ i
   - Kiá»ƒm tra: Má»Ÿ Services â†’ tÃ¬m "MySQL80" â†’ Status pháº£i lÃ  "Running"


BÆ¯á»šC 2: Táº¡o Database cho PhoneBook
-----------------------------------
1. Má»Ÿ MySQL Command Line Client (hoáº·c MySQL Workbench)

2. ÄÄƒng nháº­p vá»›i root password

3. Cháº¡y cÃ¡c lá»‡nh sau:

   CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS phonebook_db;
   
   CREATE USER 'phonebook_user'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'phonebook123';
   
   GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON phonebook_db.* TO 'phonebook_user'@'localhost';
   
   FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
   
   USE phonebook_db;

4. Database Ä‘Ã£ sáºµn sÃ ng!


BÆ¯á»šC 3: Cáº¥u hÃ¬nh káº¿t ná»‘i (Náº¾U Cáº¦N)
------------------------------------
Náº¿u báº¡n dÃ¹ng MySQL vá»›i cáº¥u hÃ¬nh KHÃC (user, password, host):

1. Má»Ÿ file PhoneBook.exe báº±ng text editor (Notepad++)
2. TÃ¬m vÃ  sá»­a pháº§n DB_CONFIG:
   - host: Äá»‹a chá»‰ MySQL server (máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh: localhost)
   - user: TÃªn user MySQL (máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh: root)
   - password: Password MySQL cá»§a báº¡n
   - database: TÃªn database (máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh: phonebook_db)
   - port: Port MySQL (máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh: 3306)

âš ï¸ LÆ¯U Ã: Báº¡n CÃ“ THá»‚ bá» qua bÆ°á»›c nÃ y náº¿u dÃ¹ng cáº¥u hÃ¬nh máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh!


BÆ¯á»šC 4: Cháº¡y á»©ng dá»¥ng
----------------------
1. Double-click file: PhoneBook.exe

2. Äá»£i 2-3 giÃ¢y Ä‘á»ƒ á»©ng dá»¥ng khá»Ÿi Ä‘á»™ng

3. Náº¿u tháº¥y cá»­a sá»• Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p â†’ CÃ€I Äáº¶T THÃ€NH CÃ”NG! âœ…

   TÃªn Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p: admin
   Máº­t kháº©u: 123456

âš ï¸ KHUYáº¾N NGHá»Š: Äá»•i máº­t kháº©u sau khi Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p láº§n Ä‘áº§u!
(VÃ o: Há»“ sÆ¡ â†’ Äá»•i máº­t kháº©u)

â— Xá»¬ LÃ Sá»° Cá»
---------------

Lá»–I: "Cannot connect to database"
â†’ Kiá»ƒm tra MySQL Server Ä‘ang cháº¡y (Services â†’ MySQL80)
â†’ Kiá»ƒm tra username/password trong config
â†’ Cháº¡y láº¡i: net start MySQL80 (trong CMD vá»›i quyá»n Admin)

Lá»–I: "Module not found"
â†’ Táº£i láº¡i file PhoneBook.exe tá»« nguá»“n tin cáº­y
â†’ Táº¯t antivirus táº¡m thá»i (cÃ³ thá»ƒ cháº·n file)

Lá»–I: á»¨ng dá»¥ng khÃ´ng khá»Ÿi Ä‘á»™ng
â†’ Kiá»ƒm tra Windows Event Viewer Ä‘á»ƒ xem log
â†’ Cháº¡y file .exe báº±ng CMD Ä‘á»ƒ xem error message:
   cd dist
   PhoneBook.exe

Lá»–I: "Permission denied"
â†’ Cháº¡y PhoneBook.exe vá»›i quyá»n Administrator
â†’ Right-click â†’ "Run as administrator"
